value.name: Police in North Carolina on hunt for men who killed pastor days after his ordination
value.description: A 25-year-old North Carolina pastor, whose ministry sought to end violence, was shot to death outside his home this week, days after he was ordained and proposed to his girlfriend.

value.name: Wilmington citizens review board ‘in the hands of the legislature’ a year after Floyd
value.description: A year from the death of George Floyd, the development of a citizens review board to oversee police actions and check for potential misconduct is making slow progress.

value.name: Life of promise cut short
